description: Combining microwave rice, pork scotch fillet steaks, fermented kimchi and veggies, this quick and tasty pork fried rice will become your new go-to meal.
keywords: Cheat's Bbq Pork & Kimchi Fried Rice
name: Cheat's Bbq Pork & Kimchi Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add rice, peas and kimchi, then stir-fry for a further 3 minutes or until heated through. Add soy, then stir-fry for 1 minute or until rice is coated. Stir in spring onion. Serve rice topped with pork and extra onion.
